body: You can use your innate magic to create minor illusions that augment your efforts at trickery and deceit.
name: Casual Illusionist
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Gnomes/New Racial Rules/Gnome Feats/Casual Illusionist

sections.body: As long as you have at least one spell-like ability unused from your gnome magic racial trait, you gain a +2 racial bonus on all Bluff, Disguise, and Sleight of Hand checks you make. At 10th level, these bonuses increase to +4.
sections.name: Benefit

sections.body: This feat counts as the Deceitful feat for the purposes of all prerequisites.
sections.name: Special
